practice_phrases: She was very kind.
她非常友好。
She was very kind today.
她今天非常友好。
She was very kind to me.
她对我非常友好。
She was very kind yesterday.
她昨天非常友好。
She was very kind when I met her.
当我遇见她时她非常友好。
She was very kind to help me.
她非常友好地帮助我。
She was very kind when she saw me feeling nervous.
当她看到我感到紧张时，她非常友好。

I think she was very kind to talk to me.
我认为她非常友好地和我说话。
She was very kind even though I made a problem.
即使我制造了问题她也非常友好。

lego: when she saw me feeling nervous
当她看到我感到紧张时
